name: T - Sarah Kate
_source: speak;Sarah; Kate, wait! We have some business to discuss!
speak;Kate; I know you probably need Carlos for some plan,{w} but you're going to have to wait!
speak;Sarah; What? No, no, I don't need Carlos, I-
speak;Kate; Listen, I know you're not too confident in your leadership.{w} I get it.{w} This time, you can follow me,{w} and we can talk girl-to-girl about leadership strategies later.
speak;Sarah; Wh- <bconvo>NO!</> I'm here to discuss business!
speak;Kate; Oh, fine, we'll compare how successful we've been after the battle is done!{w} Come on, I don't want to waste any more time!
speak;Sarah; Stars above, I forgot how competitigve she is with this group rivalry thing.
